context: Snap went public in March 2017 at $17/share. The company faced intense competition from Facebook copying Stories across Instagram, Facebook, and WhatsApp.

competitors.name: Instagram
competitors.notes: Launched Stories in 2016, directly copying Snapchat's core feature

competitors.name: Facebook
competitors.notes: Parent company aggressively copying Snap features

competitors.name: WhatsApp Status
competitors.notes: Stories feature added to messaging app

competitors.name: YouTube
competitors.notes: Video platform competing for creator content

competitors.name: Musical.ly
competitors.notes: Short-form video app later became TikTok

competitors.name: Snow
competitors.notes: Asian camera app with similar features
